name: Nodes (itch) (Sapphidoll)
description:
Puzzle RPG game based on Tower of Sorcerer.

Collect items and power ups, and kill monsters, and demon too. You get the idea.

The entire game should be beatable EVEN if you clear each level (B1F~B5F, B6F~B10F, B11F~B15F, B16F~B20F) one by one without collecting free items and power ups from another level using warp. It's possible to beat the entire game without buying any healing item or key.

In general, avoid getting another power up around stats 240, 620, and 1300,  basically before you unlock the final boost (+80 stats / item), feel free to go nuts and report how high your stats can be or how hard can you break my game.

v1.1: added point assessment at the end of the game. Using cheat room will give you -99999 points though.
